feed.title: Google Cloud: Google SecOps Marketplace
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Google SecOps Marketplace

entry.content:
Google Threat Intelligence: Version 7.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Private Submit URL
entry.summary: Google Threat Intelligence version 7.0 introduces a new Private Submit URL action. This feature enhances security by allowing for private submissions.
entry.title: Feature: New Private Submit URL Feature

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 70.0

  • Updated the error handling of the API limit and input processing of the following action:

  • Is Value In Data Table
entry.summary: Version 70.0 of Google Chronicle includes improved error handling for API limits and input processing within the 'Is Value In Data Table' action. This update enhances the reliability and performance of the platform's data analysis capabilities.
entry.title: Change: Chronicle API Update

entry.content:
Tenable.io: Version 12.0

  • Updated the entity processing mechanism in the following actions:

  • List Endpoint Vulnerabilities

  • Enrich Entities
  • Scan Endpoints
entry.summary: Version 12.0 of Tenable.io introduces an updated entity processing mechanism for several key actions. This change affects List Endpoint Vulnerabilities, Enrich Entities, and Scan Endpoints, aiming to improve their performance and efficiency.
entry.title: Change: Tenable.io version 12.0 update

entry.content:
Siemplify: Version 96.0

  • Refactored the following action:

  • Resume Alert SLA
entry.summary: Siemplify version 96.0 is now available. This release includes a refactoring of the Resume Alert SLA action.
entry.title: Change: Siemplify Version 96.0 Released

entry.content:
MISP: Version 34.0

  • Refactored the following actions:

  • Publish Event

  • Unpublish Event

  • Updated the predefined widget of the following action:

  • Enrich Entities
entry.summary: MISP version 34.0 is now available. This update includes refactoring of the Publish Event and Unpublish Event actions, along with an update to the predefined widget for the Enrich Entities action.
entry.title: Change: MISP 34.0 Released

entry.content:
CSV: Version 38.0

  • Integration: Updated dependencies.
entry.summary: CSV version 38.0 has been released with updated dependencies. This update ensures improved compatibility and performance.
entry.title: Change: CSV Version 38.0 Released

entry.content:
Tenable Security Center: Version 19.0

  • Integration: Added support to authenticate using an Access Key and a Secret Key.
entry.summary: Tenable Security Center version 19.0 is now available. This update introduces support for authentication via Access Key and Secret Key, enhancing integration flexibility.
entry.title: Change: Security Center Version 19.0 Released

entry.content:
Cofense Triage: Version 15.0

  • Improved category based filtering in the following connector:

  • Cofense Triage - Reports Connector
entry.summary: Version 15.0 of Cofense Triage introduces enhanced filtering capabilities. This update specifically improves category-based filtering within the Cofense Triage - Reports Connector, allowing for more refined data management and analysis.
entry.title: Change: Cofense Triage 15.0 Update

entry.content:
Gmail: Version 6.0

  • Integration: Updated the dependency files.
entry.summary: The Gmail app has been updated to version 6.0. This update includes changes to dependency files for improved integration.
entry.title: Change: Gmail App Updated

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 69.0

  • The following new actions have been added:

  • Generate UDM Query

  • Add Entry To Watchlist
entry.summary: Google Chronicle version 69.0 introduces two powerful new actions: Generate UDM Query and Add Entry To Watchlist.
entry.title: Feature: New Google Chronicle Features

entry.content:
CSV: Version 37.0

  • Updated support for nested JSONs in the following action:

  • Save Json to CSV
entry.summary: The latest CSV version 37.0 introduces enhanced support for nested JSONs. Specifically, the 'Save Json to CSV' action has been updated to better handle these complex data structures, improving data processing capabilities.
entry.title: Change: CSV Version 37.0 Released

entry.content:
Updated the dependency files in the following integrations:

  • Exchange: Version 117.0
  • HTTP V2: Version 10.0
entry.summary: The dependency files for Exchange (v117.0) and HTTP V2 (v10.0) have been updated. This change ensures these integrations are using the latest necessary components.
entry.title: Change: Dependency files updated

entry.content:
Urlscan.io: Version 27.0

  • Added support for the Domain entity in the following action:

  • Search For Scans
entry.summary: Urlscan.io has released version 27.0, introducing support for the Domain entity within the Search For Scans action. This update enhances the platform's capabilities for analyzing and retrieving scan data related to domains.
entry.title: Change: Urlscan.io v27.0 Release

entry.content:
Jira: Version 50.0

  • Improved handling of comments with additional styling in the following action:

  • Add Comment

  • Improved handling of comments with additional styling in the following job:

  • Sync Comments
entry.summary: Version 50.0 introduces enhanced comment handling with additional styling support for 'Add Comment' actions and 'Sync Comments' jobs. This update improves the way comments are processed and displayed.
entry.title: Change: Comment handling improvements

entry.content:
Google Threat Intelligence: Version 6.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Get Related Associations
entry.summary: New feature: Get Related Associations.
entry.title: Feature: Google Threat Intelligence v6.0

entry.content:
Splunk: Version 59.0

  • Refactored the following integration items to use the new API endpoints:

  • Ping

  • Get Host Events
  • Splunk Notable Events Connector
  • Sync Splunk ES Closed Events
  • Sync Splunk ES Comments
entry.summary: Version 59.0 of the Splunk integration has been released. This update includes refactoring for Ping, Get Host Events, Splunk Notable Events Connector, Sync Splunk ES Closed Events, and Sync Splunk ES Comments to utilize new API endpoints.
entry.title: Change: Splunk Integration Update

entry.content:
Cofense Triage: Version 14.0

  • Added the ability to filter based on category to the following connector:

  • Cofense Triage - Reports Connector
entry.summary: Cofense Triage version 14.0 introduces a new filtering capability. Users can now filter reports based on category within the Cofense Triage - Reports Connector.
entry.title: Change: New Filtering Option Added

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 68.0

  • Improved error handling in the following jobs:

  • Google Chronicle Sync Job

  • Google Chronicle Alerts Creator Job
entry.summary: Version 68.0 of Chronicle includes improved error handling for the Chronicle Sync Job and the Chronicle Alerts Creator Job. These updates aim to enhance the stability and reliability of these core Chronicle processes.
entry.title: Change: Chronicle Version 68.0 Enhancements

entry.content:
Okta: Version 11.0

  • Updated the pagination processing mechanism in the following actions:

  • List Users

  • Add Group
  • Get Group
  • List Providers
entry.summary: Okta has released version 11.0, introducing significant updates to its action processing. Key improvements include an updated pagination mechanism for actions such as List Users, Add Group, Get Group, and List Providers, aimed at enhancing performance and reliability.
entry.title: Change: Okta 11.0: Enhanced Action Performance

entry.content:
SentinelOneV2: Version 44.0

  • Updated the mechanism for fetching agent information in the following actions:

  • Disconnect Agent From Network

  • Enrich Endpoint
  • Get Agent Status
  • Get Application List For Endpoint
  • Get Events For Endpoint Hours Back
  • Initiate Full Scan
  • Move Agents
  • Reconnect Agent To The Network
entry.summary: The SentinelOneV2 integration has been updated to version 44.0. This release includes an improved mechanism for fetching agent information across several key actions, ensuring more reliable and efficient endpoint management.
entry.title: Change: SentinelOneV2 v44.0: Enhanced Agent Actions

entry.content: New Azure Monitor integration
entry.summary: We're excited to announce our new integration with Azure Monitor. This will allow for enhanced monitoring andobservability of your applications.
entry.title: Feature: Azure Monitor Integration

entry.content:
Siemplify: Version 95.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Get Case Alerts
entry.summary: Version 95.0 of Siemplify introduces the 'Get Case Alerts' action.
entry.title: Feature: New action: Get Case Alerts

entry.content:
CrowdStrike Falcon: Version 69.0

  • Refactored the pagination and filtering mechanism in the following actions:

  • List Uploaded IOCs

  • List Hosts

  • Added support for wildcards to File Paths to Scan in the following action:

  • On-Demand Scan
entry.summary: The latest version of CrowdStrike Falcon (69.0) introduces significant improvements, including refactored pagination and filtering for enhanced data retrieval in "List Uploaded IOCs" and "List Hosts" actions. Additionally, the "On-Demand Scan" action now supports wildcards in file paths, allowing for more flexible scanning options.
entry.title: Changed: CrowdStrike Falcon v69.0 Update

entry.content:
Updated action definitions to meet the new requirements of IDE in the following integrations:

Updated Integrations (45)

  • Active Directory: Version 38.0
  • AlienVault USM Appliance: Version 22.0
  • AlienVault USM Anywhere: Version 32.0
  • Area1: Version 6.0
  • BulkWhoIs: Version 16.0
  • CA Service Desk Manager: Version 23.0
  • Carbon Black Response: Version 35.0
  • Case Federation: Version 6.0
  • ConnectWise: Version 19.0
  • CSV: Version 36.0
  • DeepSight: Version 9.0
  • DomainTools: Version 9.0
  • Email V2: Version 36.0
  • Endgame: Version 11.0
  • Exchange: Version 116.0
  • F5 Big IQ: Version 6.0
  • FileOperation: Version 12.0
  • HTTP: Version 12.0
  • IntSights: Version 23.0
  • Jira: Version 49.0
  • JuniperVSRX: Version 8.0
  • McAfee EPO: Version 17.0
  • McAfee NSM: Version 8.0
  • Microsoft Graph Security: Version 23.0
  • MSSQL: Version 17.0
  • Palo Alto Next Gen Firewall: Version 26.0
  • PhishRod: Version 4.0
  • RSA NetWitness: Version 17.0
  • Runners: Version 5.0
  • Salesforce: Version 12.0
  • SCC Enterprise: Version 18.0
  • ServiceNow: Version 59.0
  • Siemplify: Version 95.0
  • SSH: Version 18.0
  • Symantec Endpoint Protection: Version 18.0
  • Symantec Endpoint Protection 12: Version 13.0
  • Symantec ICDX: Version 7.0
  • Tenable Security Center: Version 18.0
  • Twilio: Version 14.0
  • VSphere: Version 8.0
  • VirusTotal: Version 40.0
  • WildFire: Version 8.0
  • WMI: Version 10.0
  • XForce: Version 16.0
  • Zabbix: Version 14.0
  • Zendesk: Version 10.0
entry.summary: Action definitions have been updated to meet new IDE requirements across 45 integrations.
entry.title: Changed: Updated Integrations

entry.content:
Cybereason: Version 21.0

  • Integration: Added ability to provide a CA Certificate file as part of the configuration.
entry.summary: The new version of Cybereason (21.0) includes an update that allows users to provide a CA Certificate file during configuration. This enhances the integration capabilities of the software.
entry.title: Changed: Cybereason v21.0 Update

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 67.0

  • Updated curated detections processing logic in the following action:

  • Get Detection Details
entry.summary: The curated detections processing logic has been updated in the Get Detection Details action for Version 67.0.
entry.title: Changed: Chronicle V67.0 Detection Logic Update

entry.content:
The following integrations are now GUS recommended:

  • CrowdStrike Falcon: Version 69.0
  • Wiz: Version 3.0
  • Fortigate: Version 16.0
entry.summary: CrowdStrike Falcon v69.0, Wiz v3.0, and Fortigate v16.0 are now GUS recommended.
entry.title: Changed: New Recommended Integrations

entry.content:
Updated the dependency files in the following integrations:

  • Microsoft Graph Mail: Version 33.0
  • Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated: Version 10.0
entry.summary: Dependency files have been updated for Microsoft Graph Mail and Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated integrations.
entry.title: Changed: Updated Dependency Files

entry.content:
Google Security Command Center: Version 14.0

  • Added the ability to ingest Toxic Combinations and Chokepoints in the following connector:

  • Google Security Command Center - Findings Connector
entry.summary: Version 14.0 of Google Security Command Center now supports ingesting Toxic Combinations and Chokepoints data. This enhancement is available through the Findings Connector.
entry.title: Changed: Toxic Combinations and Chokepoints Ingestion

entry.content:
SentinelOneV2: Version 43.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Get Site Agents
entry.summary: A new 'Get Site Agents' action has been added to SentinelOneV2, version 43.0.
entry.title: Feature: SentinelOneV2: Get Site Agents Action

entry.content:
FortiAnalyzer: Version 8.0

  • Updated search processing logic in the following action:

  • Search Logs
entry.summary: The search logs feature in FortiAnalyzer version 8.0 has been enhanced with updated processing logic.
entry.title: Changed: FortiAnalyzer 8.0 Update

entry.content:
Freshworks Freshservice: Version 15.0

  • Added the ability to provide a department in the integration configuration for the following action:

  • Create Ticket
entry.summary: Version 15.0 of Freshworks Freshservice now allows you to specify a department when creating a ticket through the integration configuration.
entry.title: Changed: Freshservice: New Department Field in Ticket Creation

entry.content:
Microsoft Teams: Version 31.0

  • Integration: Updated the integration's action definitions to meet the new requirements of the IDE.
entry.summary: The Microsoft Teams integration has been updated to meet new IDE requirements.
entry.title: Changed: Microsoft Teams Update

entry.content:
Palo Alto XDR: Version 20.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Scan Endpoint
entry.summary: Palo Alto XDR version 20.0 introduces a new 'Scan Endpoint' action. This feature allows for enhanced endpoint security analysis.
entry.title: Feature: Palo Alto XDR 20.0: New Scan Endpoint Action

entry.content:
AWS Identity and Access Management: Version 7.0

  • Refactored the following actions:

  • Create User

  • Create Group
  • Create Policy
  • List Users
  • List Groups
  • List Policies
entry.summary: AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) has been updated to version 7.0. This release includes refactoring of several key actions: Create User, Create Group, Create Policy, List Users, List Groups, and List Policies.
entry.title: Changed: AWS IAM v7.0

entry.content:
Palo Alto Cortex XDR: Version 19.0

  • Updated incident processing logic in the following action:

  • Get Incident Details

  • Added new filtering options, the ability to create a SecOps alert for every Palo Alto XDR alert, and the ability to track updates to an incident in the following connector:

  • Palo Alto Cortex XDR Connector
entry.summary: Version 19.0 of Palo Alto Cortex XDR has been released with updated incident processing logic for 'Get Incident Details'. The Palo Alto Cortex XDR Connector now supports new filtering options, SecOps alert creation for every XDR alert, and incident update tracking.
entry.title: Changed: Palo Alto Cortex XDR - New Version

entry.content:
Tanium: Version 15.0

  • (REGRESSIVE) Updated JSON result to return data for multiple columns in the following action:

  • Get Question Results
entry.summary: The Tanium 15.0 update includes changes to the 'Get Question Results' action, now returning data for multiple columns in JSON format.
entry.title: Changed: Tanium 15.0 Update

entry.content:
ZScaler: Version 10.0

  • Added support for domain entity type in the following actions:

  • Add to Whitelist

  • Lookup Entity
entry.summary: Version 10.0 of ZScaler now supports the domain entity type for Whitelist and Lookup Entity actions.
entry.title: Changed: ZScaler 10.0 Update

entry.content:
Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated: Version 9.0

  • Updated the file management logic in the following action:

  • Download Attachments from Email
entry.summary: The Download Attachments from Email action has been updated with new file management logic.
entry.title: Changed: Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated - Version 9.0

entry.content:
CSV: Version 35.0

  • Updated file path processing logic in the following connector:

  • CSV Connector
entry.summary: The CSV connector has been updated with new file path processing logic.
entry.title: Changed: CSV Connector Update

entry.content:
Exchange: Version 115.0

  • Updated the file management logic in the following action:

  • Download Attachments
entry.summary: Version 115.0 of Exchange is here, with an update to the Download Attachments action's file management logic.
entry.title: Changed: Exchange 115.0

entry.content:
Microsoft Graph Mail: Version 32.0

  • Updated the file management logic in the following action:

  • Download Attachments from Email
entry.summary: The Microsoft Graph Mail V32.0 update introduces changes to file management, specifically enhancing the 'Download Attachments from Email' action.
entry.title: Changed: Microsoft Graph Mail v32.0 Update

entry.content:
CrowdStrike Falcon: Version 68.0

  • Update the following action to check if there is an existing identical running scan for a provided hostname before creating a new one:

  • On-Demand Scan
entry.summary: CrowdStrike Falcon version 68.0 includes an update to the On-Demand Scan feature. The system will now check for existing identical running scans on a provided hostname before initiating a new one.
entry.title: Changed: CrowdStrike Falcon v68.0: On-Demand Scan Update

entry.content:
CrowdStrike Falcon: Version 67.0

  • Fixed a bug where the Contains filter would fail to find hosts when the Max Hosts To Return limit was applied in the following action:

  • List Host
entry.summary: Version 67.0 of CrowdStrike Falcon has been released. This update includes a fix for the Contains filter bug when the Max Hosts To Return limit is applied to the List Host action.
entry.title: Changed: CrowdStrike Falcon v67.0 Update

entry.content:
SentinelOneV2: Version 42.0

  • The following new actions have been added:

  • Create Device Control Rule

  • Delete Device Control Rule
  • Update Device Control Rule
entry.summary: SentinelOneV2 version 42.0 introduces new capabilities for managing device control. Users can now create, delete, and update device control rules directly.
entry.title: Feature: New Device Control Features in SentinelOneV2

entry.content:
CSV: Version 34.0

  • Fixed a bug that caused inconsistent column order for the same JSON input by stabilizing the order based on the keys of the first object in the list in the following action:

  • Save Json to CSV
entry.summary: The latest update for CSV, version 34.0, resolves an issue with inconsistent column order in JSON to CSV conversions. The column order is now stabilized based on the keys of the first JSON object.
entry.title: Changed: CSV Version 34.0

entry.content:
DomainTools: Version 8.0

  • Extended capabilities in the following action:

  • Get Domain Risk

  • Added support for the domain entity type in the following actions:

  • Get Domain Profile

  • Get Domain Risk
  • Reverse Domain
entry.summary: DomainTools 8.0 has been released with extended capabilities for Get Domain Risk and added support for the domain entity type in Get Domain Profile, Get Domain Risk, and Reverse Domain actions.
entry.title: Changed: DomainTools 8.0

entry.content:
Microsoft Teams: Version 30.0

  • Integration: Fixed an issue with the special characters in the query parameters.
entry.summary: A new version of Microsoft Teams is available.
entry.title: Changed: Microsoft Teams Update

entry.content:
Okta: Version 10.0

  • Updated the pagination processing mechanism in the following actions:

  • List Users

  • Add Group
  • Get Group
  • List Providers
entry.summary: Okta version 10.0 has been released, featuring updates to the pagination processing for List Users, Add Group, Get Group, and List Providers actions.
entry.title: Changed: Okta 10.0 Release

entry.content:
CrowdStrike Falcon: Version 66.0

  • Updated entity processing logic in the following actions:

  • Contain Endpoint

  • Download File
  • Execute Command
  • Get Host Information
  • Lift Contained Endpoint
  • List Host Vulnerabilities
  • On-Demand Scan
  • Run Script
entry.summary: The CrowdStrike Falcon app has been updated to version 66.0. This release includes changes to entity processing logic for several actions, including endpoint containment, file downloads, command execution, host information retrieval, and more.
entry.title: Changed: CrowdStrike Falcon v66.0 Update

entry.content:
Azure Active Directory: Version 19.0

  • Improved performance by implementing a direct API filter query for group name searches, which avoids fetching all groups and significantly reduces execution time in large-group environments, in the following action:

  • List Members in Group
entry.summary: Version 19.0 of Azure Active Directory introduces a performance enhancement for the List Members in Group action. By implementing a direct API filter query for group name searches, it now avoids fetching all groups, leading to significantly reduced execution times, especially in environments with large numbers of groups.
entry.title: Changed: Azure Active Directory v19.0 Update

entry.content:
Updated dependencies in the following integrations:

  • Microsoft Teams: Version 30.0
  • Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated: Version 8.0
  • Exchange: Version 114.0
  • Case Federation: Version 5.0
  • Azure Security Center: Version 12.0
entry.summary: Dependencies have been updated across several integrations, including Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated, Exchange, Case Federation, and Azure Security Center.
entry.title: Changed: Updated Integrations

entry.content:
UrlScan.io: Version 26.0

  • Added ability to scan domains and IPs in the following action:

  • URL Check
entry.summary: UrlScan.io has been updated to version 26.0. This update adds the functionality to scan domains and IPs within the URL Check action.
entry.title: Changed: UrlScan.io - Version 26.0

entry.content:
ThreatQ: Version 15.0

  • Updated the API request payload to align with a change in the ThreatQ API in the following actions:

  • Enrich IP

  • Enrich URL
  • Enrich Email
  • Enrich Hash
  • Enrich CVE
entry.summary: The API request payload has been updated for several actions, including Enrich IP, URL, Email, Hash, and CVE, to align with recent changes in the ThreatQ API.
entry.title: Changed: ThreatQ v15.0 Update

entry.content:
CrowdStrike Falcon: Version 66.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Get Alert Details
entry.summary: A new 'Get Alert Details' action has been added to CrowdStrike Falcon, version 66.0.
entry.title: Feature: CrowdStrike Falcon v66.0 Alert Details

entry.content:
Google Workspace: Version 22.0

  • Updated the action description to reflect that the action deletes the extension from the blocklist rather than deleting the extension from the organizational unit in the following action:

  • Delete Extension
entry.summary: The 'Delete Extension' action in Google Workspace has been updated. It now removes the extension from the blocklist, instead of deleting it from the organizational unit.
entry.title: Changed: Extension update

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 66.0

  • Updated processing of reference list rows in the following action:

  • Get Reference Lists
entry.summary: Version 66.0 of Google Chronicle has been released. This update includes changes to how reference list rows are processed in the Get Reference Lists action.
entry.title: Changed: Google Chronicle Update

entry.content:
Google Threat Intelligence: Version 5.0

  • Added ability to filter by issue name in the following connector:

  • Google Threat Intelligence - ASM Issues Connector

  • Added ability to filter events in the following connector:

  • Google Threat Intelligence - DTM Alerts Connector
entry.summary: New filtering options available for ASM Issues and DTM Alerts connectors.
entry.title: Changed: Google Threat Intelligence Update

entry.content:
Microsoft Teams: Version 29.0

  • Refactored action logic in the following actions:

  • Get Authorization

  • Generate Token
entry.summary: Microsoft Teams has been updated to version 29.0. This update includes refactored action logic for the Get Authorization and Generate Token actions.
entry.title: Changed: Microsoft Teams Update

entry.content: New Apache Kafka integration
entry.summary: We're excited to announce our new Apache Kafka integration.
entry.title: Feature: New Apache Kafka integration

entry.content:
Microsoft Azure Sentinel: Version 57.0

  • The following new job has been added:

  • Sync Incidents
entry.summary: A new job, Sync Incidents, has been added to Microsoft Azure Sentinel version 57.0.
entry.title: Feature: Sync Incidents in Azure Sentinel

entry.content:
Any.Run: Version 8.0

  • Updated the available privacy settings in the following actions:

  • Analyze URL

  • Analyze File URL
  • Analyze File
entry.summary: Any.Run version 8.0 introduces updated privacy settings for Analyze URL, Analyze File URL, and Analyze File actions.
entry.title: Changed: Any.Run v8.0: Enhanced Privacy Controls

entry.content:
CrowdStrike Falcon: Version 64.0

  • Updated timeout handling in the following connector:

  • Crowdstrike Falcon - Streaming Events Connector

  • Integration: Updated authentication to support multi-tenancy execution.
entry.summary: Crowdstrike Falcon version 64.0 has been released with updates to the Streaming Events Connector for improved timeout handling. Additionally, authentication has been updated to support multi-tenancy execution.
entry.title: Changed: Crowdstrike Falcon 64.0 Update

entry.content:
Google Workspace: Version 21.0

  • Expanded capabilities of the following action:

  • List OU Of Account

  • Updated processing of the organization unit inside the following actions:

  • Block Extension

  • Delete Extension
  • List OU Of Account
entry.summary: Google Workspace has been updated to version 21.0, with expanded capabilities for 'List OU Of Account' and updated processing for organization units in 'Block Extension', 'Delete Extension', and 'List OU Of Account' actions.
entry.title: Changed: Google Workspace Update

entry.content:
Orca Security: Version 12.0

  • Integration: (REGRESSIVE) Updated to support the latest API version.

Ontology has been updated. Overwrite current ontology mapping to align with the new API alert structure.
entry.summary: Orca Security version 12.0 has been released with an updated integration to support the latest API version. The ontology has been modified to align with the new API alert structure, and users should overwrite their current ontology mapping.
entry.title: Changed: Orca Security 12.0

entry.content:
Google Chronicle: Version 65.0

  • Updated the filtering mechanism of the following action:

  • Get Data Tables
entry.summary: Version 65.0 of Google Chronicle includes an updated filtering mechanism for the Get Data Tables action.
entry.title: Changed: Google Chronicle v65.0 Update

entry.content:
SentinelOneV2: Version 41.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Update Alert

  • The following new connector has been added:

  • SentinelOne - Alert Connector

  • A new predefined widget has been added to the following action:

  • Update Alert
entry.summary: Version 41.0 of SentinelOne brings new capabilities, including an 'Update Alert' action and a 'SentinelOne - Alert Connector'.
entry.title: Feature: New Features in SentinelOne V41.0

entry.content:
Google Threat Intelligence: Version 4.0

  • The following new action has been added:

  • Set DTM Alert Analysis
entry.summary: Google Threat Intelligence 4.0 introduces a new action: Set DTM Alert Analysis.
entry.title: Feature: New DTM Alert Analysis Feature

entry.content:
Palo Alto Cortex XDR: Version 18.0

  • The following new actions have been added:

  • Add Comment To Incident

  • Execute XQL Search
  • Get Incident Details
entry.summary: The latest version of Palo Alto Cortex XDR (18.0) introduces powerful new incident management capabilities, including the ability to add comments, execute XQL searches, and retrieve detailed incident information.
entry.title: Feature: Palo Alto Cortex XDR - New Actions

entry.content:
Google Threat Intelligence: Version 4.0

  • Updated the processing of the threat actor entity in the following action:

  • Enrich Entities

  • Updated the predefined widget in the following actions:

(REGRESSIVE) The widget now works with GTI information. To see the changes, the widget must be re-added to the existing views in playbooks.

  • Enrich Entities
  • Enrich IOCs

  • Added JSON samples to the following action:

  • Enrich Entities
entry.summary: Google Threat Intelligence has been updated to version 4.0. This update includes changes to the processing of threat actor entities and updates to predefined widgets in the Enrich Entities and Enrich IOCs actions. JSON samples have also been added to the Enrich Entities action.
entry.title: Changed: Google Threat Intelligence Update

entry.content:
Trend Vision One: Version 6.0

  • Added support for Agent UUID in the following actions:

  • Enrich Entities

  • Execute Custom Script
  • Isolate Endpoint
  • Unisolate Endpoint
entry.summary: Version 6.0 of Trend Vision One introduces Agent UUID support for key actions like Enrich Entities, Execute Custom Script, Isolate Endpoint, and Unisolate Endpoint.
entry.title: Changed: Trend Vision One 6.0 Update

entry.content:
Splunk: Version 58.0

  • Updated the alert processing logic in the following connector:

  • Splunk ES - Notable Events Connector
entry.summary: Version 58.0 of the Splunk connector includes updated alert processing logic for the Splunk ES Notable Events Connector.
entry.title: Changed: Splunk ES Notable Events Connector Alert Processing Updated

entry.content:
Jira: Version 48.0

  • Integration: Updated the SDK version.

entry.content:

  • Azure AD Identity Protection: Version 7.0
  • Microsoft Teams: Version 28.0

Microsoft Azure Sentinel: Version 54.0

  • Added an ability to not process the alert until Scheduled/NRT alert objects are available from API in the following connectors:

  • Microsoft Azure Sentinel - Incident Connector v2

  • Microsoft Azure Sentinel - Incident Tracking Connector
entry.summary: The Microsoft Azure Sentinel has been updated to version 54.0. This update includes an enhancement to the Incident Connector v2 and Incident Tracking Connector, allowing them to avoid processing alerts until the necessary Scheduled/NRT alert objects are available from the API.
entry.title: Changed: Azure Sentinel Update to Version 54.0

entry.content:
Refactored the code to work with updated API in the following integrations:

  • Exchange: Version 113.0
  • ServiceNow: Version 57.0
  • Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated: Version 5.0

Refactored the code in the following integrations:

  • Gmail: Version 4.0
  • Google Cloud API: Version 6.0
  • HTTP v2: Version 9.0
  • Microsoft Graph Mail: Version 28.0
  • Tor: Version 7.0
entry.summary: The code has been refactored to support updated APIs in Exchange (v113.0), ServiceNow (v57.0), and Microsoft Graph Mail Delegated (v5.0). Additionally, refactoring was done for Gmail (v4.0), Google Cloud API (v6.0), HTTP v2 (v9.0), Microsoft Graph Mail (v28.0), and Tor (v7.0).
entry.title: Changed: Code refactoring for updated API integrations

entry.content:

  • BMC Remedy ITSM: Version 8.0
  • Gmail: Version 3.0
  • Google Cloud API: Version 5.0
  • Microsoft Graph Mail: Version 27.0
  • Service Desk Plus V3: Version 6.0
  • Vertex AI: Version 2.0

entry.title: Changed: Code Refactored for Updated Integrations
